DOC.brief_title: Effects Supplement Derived From Palm Oil Cholesterol Levels Blood
DOC.detailed_description: Both tocotrienols tocopherol , whose derivative eight different isoforms , closely relate structurally . Tocopherols generally present common vegetable oil ( i.e . soy , canola ) . However , tocotrienols concentrate cereal grain ( ie . oat , barley , rye , rice bran ) , high level find crude palm oil . The development new cholesterol-lowering agent give attention pharmaceutical company due strong relationship cholesterol atherosclerosis . Tocotrienols , especially δ- γ-tocotrienols , show effective nutritional agent treat high cholesterol recent research program . In particular , γ-tocotrienol appear inhibit 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl-coenzyme A reductase posttranscriptional level evidence tocopherol antagonize effect . Therefore , current study design demonstrate treatment tocotrienol-enriched fraction palm oil three month period lead significant reduction LDL cholesterol effect HDL cholesterol patient whose cholesterol level adequately control spite statin . This objective achieve utilizing simple three arm randomize placebo-controlled trial total 99 subject After acclimation step I AHA diet supplemental vitamin E diet , subject give either placebo capsule tocotrienol ( 120mg 240mg ) capsule addition statin medication
DOC.criteria: Able read , speak , understand English Male female , 3570 year old ( inclusive ) Total Fasting Plasma Cholesterol > 180 mg/dl Currently take statin medication . Willing maintain AHA Step 1 diet duration study . Any subject take vitamin E supplement take antibiotic medication dietary supplement could interfere action tocotrienols . Any subject take cholesterol lower medication statin . Any subject lose > 5 % body weight past 3 month . Any subject history gastrointestinal surgery , diabetes mellitus , serious medical condition , chronic hepatitis renal disease , bleed disorder , congestive heart disease , chronic diarrhea disorder , myocardial infarction , coronary artery bypass graft , angioplasty within 6 month prior screen , current diagnosis uncontrolled hypertension ( define BP > 160mmHg , diastolic BP > 95mmHg ) , active chronic gastrointestinal disorder , bulimia , anorexia , laxative abuse , endocrine disease ( except thyroid disease require medication ) indicate medical history routine physical examination . Major surgery within 12 week prior subject randomization and/or screening , especially cardiac surgery Is currently smoker therapeutic plan quit smoke anytime study period ; current smoker , quit smoking within past 3 month . Known HIV positive know immunocompromised condition ( e.g . MV , organ transplantation , treatment immunosuppressant medication ) . Clinical evidence current malignancy exception basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin cervical intraepithelial neoplasia . Currently receive systemic chemotherapy and/or radiotherapy . Active bleeding . Subject disorder ( exclude illiteracy visual impairment ) compromise ability subject give write informed consent and/or comply study procedure . In opinion study investigator risk noncompliance study procedure , read , understand complete study related material .
